# Get Started

# Basics

A Shiny app is a web page (UI) connected to a computer running a live R session (Server)

```{r init, echo=FALSE, fig.align="center", out.width='50%'}
knitr::include_graphics("cheat1.png")
```

--

Users can manipulate the UI, which will cause the server to update the UI‚Äôs displays (by running R code).

.footnote[Source: Shiny RStudio Cheatsheet.]

---

# App.R üìÑ


```{r eval=FALSE, tidy=FALSE}

library(shiny)

# User interfase
UI <- fluidPage( ) 

# Server
Server <- function (input, output){      }

# Combines UI and server
shinyApp (ui = ui, server = server)

```

You can insert all the code at once with the shinyapp snippet

```{r init2, echo=FALSE, fig.align="center", out.width='50%'}
knitr::include_graphics("snippet_2.png")
```

---

# Building a shiny app

.pull-left[

**UI**

1. Add the snippet into an app.R script

1. Select a layout function 

1. Select Inputs and place them

]

.pull-right[

**Server**

1. Refer to outputs with ```output$<id>```

1. Refer to inputs with ```input$<id>```

1. Wrap code in a ```render*()``` function before saving to output

]

# Input selection

`radioButtons()` arguments

```{r eval=FALSE, tidy=FALSE}
radioButtons(inputId,
             label,
             choices = NULL,
             selected = NULL,
             inline = FALSE,
             width = NULL,
             choiceNames = NULL, 
             choiceValues = NULL)

```
---

class: center, middle

```{r init7, echo=FALSE, fig.align="center", out.width='90%'}
knitr::include_graphics("parentesis.png")
```

# Selecting arguments

Selecting the parameters

```{r eval=FALSE, tidy=FALSE}

radioButtons(inputId = "Vx", #<<
             label = "X", #<<
             choices = c("Millas de autopista por galon" = "hwy",
                         "Millas de ciudad por galon" = "cty", 
                         "Cilindrada del motor (L)" = "displ"))
```

---

# UI code

```{r eval=FALSE, tidy=FALSE}

ui<- fluidPage(
              sidebarLayout(
                sidebarPanel(radioButtons("Vx",
                                          "Eje X",
                                          selected = "displ",
                                          choices= c("Millas de autopista por galon"="hwy",
                                                     "Millas de ciudad por galon"="cty",
                                                     "Cilindrada del motor (L)"="displ"))),
                mainPanel( plotOutput( ))))

```
